mapper.insert:
hierarchical
insert into clientele (name, age, sex, identity, account_id) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update clientele set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, identity = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, age, sex, identity, account_id from clientele
